infoTargets.name: Sentralbygget - The Hangar
infoTargets.information: Hangaren is one of NTNU's largest cantines with a new dinner buffet, and much more, every day.

infoTargets.name: Frimerket
infoTargets.information: In the autumn, a large tent is erected to host the yearly career days where students can meet exciting employers.

infoTargets.name: Frimerket
infoTargets.information: Before the autumn semester starts, all new students are invited to the matriculation to mark the new year at NTNU.

infoTargets.name: Sentralbygget
infoTargets.information: If you ever need a break from your studies, Sentralbygget has a room ready with board games and table tennis.

infoTargets.name: Sentralbygget - Akademika
infoTargets.information: At Akademika you can buy course curriculum, stationery, NTNU merch, and much more.

infoTargets.name: Sentralbygget - Stripa
infoTargets.information: At Stripa you will always find student organizations who ask for your attention (and maybe offer a gift in return).

infoTargets.name: Orientation week
infoTargets.information: New students are invited to orientation week to meet new friends, attend activities, and familiarize with the campus.

infoTargets.name: The courses
infoTargets.information: Students usually have 4 courses per semester with exams in each course.

infoTargets.name: Assignments
infoTargets.information: In addition to 1-2 lectures a week, most courses have weekly or bi-weekly assignments.

infoTargets.name: Student advisors
infoTargets.information: Student advisors can help you with questions or adaptations to your program of study.

infoTargets.name: Student unions
infoTargets.information: Every study programme has a student union, led by its students, which hosts activities and presentations throughout the year.
